text: Alton Desbrisay Taylor (March 30, 1889 – July 25, 1947) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Sunbury County from 1925 to 1935. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1889 births Category:1947 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: Alton D. Taylor
